name: To the stars (Efhi)
description:
To the stars is aiming to be a 2D space simulator in which you can battle enemies, mine asteroids, complete missions, land on planets, etc.

For now it is a prototype and some of the features mentioned are not implemented yet and will be added in future versions as we work on them.

CHANGELOG   Alpha 0.2   -    (12/03/2020)

-English/Spanish support.

-Asteroids spawn time balanced.

-Player and enemies movement improved.

-Enemies have higher firerate now!

-Mining laser sound improved.

-Simple tutorial added.

-ESC ingame menu added.

-Minor bug fixes.
